title: Kimchi Soup
description: Kimchi soup is a traditional Korean dish made with kimchi, tofu, pork, and assorted vegetables. It is a popular comfort food in Korea and is often served as a main course. The soup is spicy, tangy, and full of flavor, making it the perfect dish for a cold winter day. In this recipe, we will show you how to make kimchi soup at home using simple ingredients that you can find at your local grocery store. So grab your apron and get ready to cook up a delicious bowl of kimchi soup!

instructions.description: Gather all the ingredients and chop the onion, garlic, and pork
Cut the tofu into small cubes and set aside

instructions.step: Step 3: Heat pot and sauté onion and garlic
instructions.description: Heat a pot over medium heat and sauté the onion and garlic until fragrant

instructions.step: Step 4: Add pork and cook until browned
instructions.description: Add the pork to the pot and cook until browned

instructions.step: Step 5: Add kimchi and cook for a few minutes
instructions.description: Add the kimchi to the pot and cook for a few minutes until fragrant

instructions.step: Step 6: Add water and bring to a boil
instructions.description: Add water to the pot and bring to a boil

instructions.step: Step 7: Add tofu and simmer for 10 minutes
instructions.description: Add the tofu to the pot and simmer for 10 minutes

instructions.step: Step 8: Season with soy sauce and sesame oil
instructions.description: Season the soup with soy sauce and sesame oil to taste
Serve the kimchi soup hot with a side of rice or noodles
